lead_paragraph: LISANTI--Catherine, (nee Roddy) on April 15. Beloved daughter of the late Edward and Mary (Foudy) Roddy. Beloved wife of the late Vincent Anthony (Jim). Adored mother of Mary and Vincent. Cherished grandmother to Kelly, Kevin, Jeannie, Eric and Matthew. Aunt and adopted grandmother to many. Visitation at the Kennedy Roth Funeral Home, 41-45 58th Street, Woodside, NY 11377, Thursday from 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial Friday, April 22nd at 10:45am at St. Sebastian's Roman Catholic Church, 58-02 Roosevelt Avenue, Woodside, NY 11377. 1/3
